body:
No problem until yesterday, now I tried again many times, including clone again, but problem exists:

root@ubuntu:/home/zte/share/k8s-clone/kubernetes# git commit
Checking that it builds... 
make: **\* No rule to make target `/*.go', needed by`_output/bin/deepcopy-gen'.  Stop.

Checking for docs that need updating... make: **\* No rule to make target `/*.go', needed by`_output/bin/deepcopy-gen'.  Stop.
!!! Error in hack/verify-munge-docs.sh:29
  'make -C "${KUBE_ROOT}/" WHAT=cmd/mungedocs' exited with status 2
Call stack:
  1: hack/verify-munge-docs.sh:29 main(...)
Exiting with status 1
ERROR!
Some docs are out of sync between CLI and markdown.
To regenerate docs, run:
  hack/update-munge-docs.sh

Checking for swagger type documentation that need updating... ERROR!
Swagger type documentation needs to be updated.
To regenerate the spec, run:
  hack/update-generated-swagger-docs.sh

  1: /home/zte/share/k8s-clone/kubernetes/hack/lib/golang.sh:587 kube::golang::build_binaries(...)
  2: hack/make-rules/build.sh:26 main(...)
Exiting with status 1
make: **\* [all] Error 1
!!! Error in hack/verify-swagger-spec.sh:26
  'make -C "${KUBE_ROOT}" WHAT=cmd/kube-apiserver' exited with status 2
Call stack:
  1: hack/verify-swagger-spec.sh:26 main(...)
Exiting with status 1
ERROR!
Swagger spec needs to be updated.
To regenerate the spec, run:
  hack/update-swagger-spec.sh

Aborting commit

labels.description: Issues or PRs related to the Release Engineering subproject
labels.name: area/release-eng

title: make: *** No rule to make target `/*.go', needed by `_output/bin/deepcopy-gen'.  Stop.
